activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Zaɓi kalmar wucewa don shiga da ita.
Kalma mai sauƙi wacce ta ƙunshi ƴan kalmomi waɗanda za ku iya tunawa cikin sauƙi.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Zaɓi kalmar wucewa mai kyau don kare asusunku. Duba shawarwarin don wasu ra'ayoyi.
activate.IfYouFeel: Idan kun ji wani abu ba daidai ba, kuna iya

authorize.TermsLabel:
Na karanta kuma na yarda
zuwa {999}
authorize.mustAgree: Da farko dole ne ku yarda da sharuɗɗan.

notifications.title: Izini
notifications.prompt: Kuna son kunna sanarwar? Za ku sami sabuntawa na ainihin-lokaci game da abubuwan da kuke damu da su.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Barka da zuwa! Da fatan za a tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ku.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Barka da zuwa! Tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ku.
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: Kun gama kunna mai amfani. Gwada shiga yanzu.

dialog.title: Zaɓi lamba
dialog.EmptyContacts: Ba a sami lambobin sadarwa ba...

usersContacts.selectLabel: Da fatan za a zaɓi lakabi.

login.title: Barka da zuwa
login.resendConfirm: Kuna son aika saƙo don sake saita kalmar wucewar ku?
login.resendSuccess: Bincika sako don sake saita kalmar wucewar ku
login.noPassphrase: Kafin ka iya shiga, dole ne ka saita kalmar wucewa ta danna hanyar haɗin da ke cikin saƙon kunnawa.
login.notVerified: Dole ne ku aika wa kanku saƙon kunnawa don shiga.
login.emailExists: Shin kun yi ƙoƙarin yin rajista da wannan imel ɗin a baya? Idan haka ne, duba akwatin saƙo mai shiga don kunna asusunku. Danna don sake aika saƙon
login.mobileExists: Shin kun gwada yin rajista da wannan lambar wayar a baya? Idan haka ne, duba SMS ɗin ku don kunna asusunku. Danna don sake aika saƙon
login.newUser: ko ƙirƙirar sabon asusu a ƙasa

placeholders.email: shigar da adireshin imel ɗin ku
placeholders.username: yi amfani da haruffa da lambobi kawai

login.facebookNoEmail: Asusun Facebook ɗinku ya ɓace tabbataccen adireshin imel. Kawai shiga cikin hanyar asali.
login.picTooltip: Kuna iya canza wannan hoton daga baya

alert.title: Ana turawa zuwa Wallet
alert.content: Da zarar ka rufe wannan magana, za a kai ka zuwa jakarka. Bayan kun shiga, koma wannan shafin.
